va_camera_parametersðŸ”—

#include <va_camera_parameters.h>
struct va_camera_parametersðŸ”—

Camera parameters.

Public Members

double fxðŸ”—

X component of focal length, in pixels.

double fyðŸ”—

Y component of focal length, in pixels.

double cxðŸ”—

X coordinate of the principal point (optical center).

double cyðŸ”—

Y coordinate of the principal point (optical center).

double k1ðŸ”—

First (second-order) radial distortion factor.

double k2ðŸ”—

Second (fourth-order) radial distortion factor.

double p1ðŸ”—

First tangential distortion factor.

double p2ðŸ”—

Second tangential distortion factor.

va_camera_sensor_type sensor_typeðŸ”—

Sensor type.

Enums

enum va_camera_sensor_typeðŸ”—

Supported camera sensor types.

Values:

enumerator va_area_sensorðŸ”—

The camera has an area (matrix) sensor.

Most cameras are of this type.

enumerator va_line_sensorðŸ”—

The camera has a line sensor, which usually consists of just one pixel in vertical direction.
